title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the CodeChallengeGenerator system, including the desired features, user stories, technical constraints, and non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, security, maintainability, accessibility. Ensure that the requirements cover the needs of different user roles (e.g., instructors, students, administrators) and consider integration with existing systems or platforms, if applicable. Also, prioritize the requirements based on their impact, urgency, and feasibility. This task aims to create a comprehensive document that serves as a foundation for the development process.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including the components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and development tools.

title: Implement Challenge Generation Logic
description: Develop the core logic for generating coding challenges based on specified difficulty levels, topics, and learning objectives.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the CodeChallengeGenerator system, including the ability to specify challenge parameters and view generated challenges.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solution for storing and retrieving generated challenges and user data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the system from potential threats, such as input validation, authentication, and authorization mechanisms.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the CodeChallengeGenerator system, including user guides, technical documentation, and API references.

title: Set up Testing Framework
description: Establish a testing framework and write unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure the quality and reliability of the system.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the CodeChallengeGenerator system to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms to ensure its proper functioning.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage
